entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Temperature: 8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late this morning and early this afternoon. A few showers beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with snow changing to snow near noon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
